item.title: How to Setup My Personal Blog With Hugo, Github
item.description: Install Hugo on your PC Nothing special, just follow the instructions of official documentation Here Create a repository in github Create a repository with <yourname>.github.io Create the new site Use hugo command to generate the new site hugo new site charlesgeng.github.io Checkout the repository from github git init git remote add origin https://github.com/CharlesGeng/charlesgeng.github.io.git git fetch git checkout origin/master -ft Add mainroad theme to the site.
